node.doctext:
Hache te te pe, dos puntos. Diagonal diagonal, doble-u, doble-u, doble-u, (or sometimes doble-ve, doble-ve, doble-ve) punto [Everything2|TODO2] punto com.

This is a usergroup for Spanish speakers, Spanish learners, and Spanish language enthusiasts. Speaking Spanish is not a prerequisite, perhaps only an eventual goal. Everyone is welcome. Mi casa es su casa.

¡Bienvenidos!

[{linkGroupMessages:Swap}]

[{weblog:3}]
